data.text: Waliyiya falana Damasi taan xili ma:
Aroyeri yamanan taane luma nɛn nabeɲinxi
Taa makantan yin yo mi fa luma Efirami yamanani sɔnɔn.
A tɔnsɔn dɔnxɛna ndee luma nɛn a kentun daxin na,
E mi fa e yɛɛ rasigɛ suxure kidene yi mumɛ,
Na lɔxɔni, e taa makantanxin naxanye rabeɲinma Isirayila kaane bun, ne birin yigenla luma nɛn alo fɔtɔnna hanma geyaan kondena.
Amasɔtɔ i bata ɲinan Ala xɔn i rakisimana.
I e si lɔxɔn naxan yi,
Gaxu gbeen na a ra ɲinbanna ra,
